amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect the United States from an energy tax.

vote.text: Amendment SA 928 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 103.

action.text: Amendment SA 928 proposed by Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S1989-1990; text: CR S1989-1990) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect the United States from an energy tax.
